primaryLocation.message: summary: Ensures that classes referenced in the manifest are present in the project or libraries message: Class referenced in the manifest, com.octo.appaloosasdk.async.AppaloosaSpiceService, was not found in the project or the libraries
summary: Checks that ScrollViews use wrap_content in scrolling dimension message: This RelativeLayout should use android:layout_height="wrap_content"

summary: Checks that the manifest specifies a targetSdkVersion that is recent message: Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.
